item.title: The Secrets To Combatting Content Overload: How To Craft Content People Love - The Buffer Blog
item.description:
The Secrets To Combatting Content Overload: How To Craft Content People Love - The Buffer Blog

The Internet is becoming increasingly cluttered. In 2005, we were reportedly exposed to over 3,500 brand messages per day. Nowadays, that figure is closer to 10,000 (if not already higher). 5.3 trillion display ads are shown online each year, 400 million Tweets sent daily, and 4.75 billion pieces of content shared on Facebook every day.

item.title: What is Google RankBrain and How Does It Affect Your Website's SERP Rankings?
item.description:
What is Google RankBrain and How Does It Affect Your Website's SERP Rankings?

If you're involved with SEO, you know that Google (and the other search engines) uses a complex algorithm to determine how a page ranks in the search engine results pages (SERPs). No one but Google knows exactly what's in the algorithm's "secret sauce" (it's rumored that there are more than 200 factors it considers), but SEO experts have inklings about what makes a page rank higher than others.

item.title: Six Step Process for Handling social Media Complaints
item.description:
Six Step Process for Handling social Media Complaints

Dealing with complainers and haters in social media can, of course, be tricky. What you need is a framework for how to do it right. This is that framework: F-E-A-R-S: You may notice that I didn't include "be fast" as a specific component. This is because it is axiomatic.

item.title: Influencer Marketing Play Book
item.description:
Influencer Marketing Play Book

Digital Marketing by Kristen Matthews Kristen Matthews is the marketing and community manager at GroupHigh, a blogger identification and analysis platform. She loves the collaborative elements of digital and social marketing, so don't hesitate to reach out to her at any time. Influence marketing keeps evolving at a rapid pace.
